import{React, useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const apiurl=`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts` export default (props)=>{ //STATE OBJECT IMPLEMENTATION var [posts,setStatePosts] = useState([]); useEffect(()=> { axios.get(apiurl).then((result)=>setStatePosts(result.data)) },[]) return(<>
